title: April Metal Type Newsletter
content:
The April edition of the Metal Type newsletter is now out.

This month's video was filmed at the nerve-centre of Northern Rail's operations at the historical York railway station . . .  
. . . OK, you've guessed it I was stuck at work and had to film it in my office!

Don't let that put you off though, there has been plenty of interesting new material added to the site in the last month.

Click the link below to take a look:  
 [http://www.metaltype.co.uk/rail/clicks/click.php?id=17](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023141302/http:/www.metaltype.co.uk/rail/clicks/click.php?id=17 "http://www.metaltype.co.uk/rail/clicks/click.php?id=17")
author: MetalType
